conversation.content: Hola, tengo un problema con mi reserva y necesito hablar con una persona porque es urgente.
Quiero que me transfieran a un agente humano. Mi vuelo de Madrid a New York para el 5 de noviembre aparece cancelado en la app.
I’ll just need a few quick details before I connect you. Could I have your full name, please?
Thank you, Laura Gómez. Could you please provide your phone number?
Got it, +34 600 123 987. Could you please provide your email address?
Thank you. Just to confirm, that’s laura.gomez85@gmail.com, correct?
Understood. Since this is about an existing booking, do you have your reservation or PNR handy?

Thanks. Here’s a quick summary before I transfer: Caller name Laura Gómez, phone +34 600 123 987, email laura.gomez85@gmail.com, PNR Q7F2L9, reason: urgent assistance for a canceled Madrid–New York flight on November 5. I’ll connect you with a Celestar Air specialist. One moment please.

mistakes.incorrect guideline: Continue in the caller’s non‑English language or respond curtly to non‑English greetings.

mistakes.evidence: I’ll just need a few quick details before I connect you. Could I have your full name, please?
mistakes.incorrect guideline: Phase 1 — Confirm Intent (Incorrect): The agent should fail to confirm whether the caller wishes to be transferred, but instead proceeds as if they had already confirmed.
End the call without checking whether the caller has any additional needs or questions.
